Key Match Events: South Africa's David Miller and Aiden Markram both hit half-centuries.
Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 29 runs.
Wayne Parnell took 3 wickets for 15 runs.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 40 balls.
Virat Kohli dropped a catch of Aiden Markram at 35 runs.
Ravichandran Ashwin dismissed Tristan Stubbs in a crucial over.
Pre-Game Insights: India opted to bat first against South Africa in the T20 World Cup 2022.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli commented 'Tough day today but we focus on the next one.'
Lungi Ngidi expressed his excitement, saying 'This was one of my biggest dreams.'
Rohit Sharma reflected on the defeat, stating 'We have played in such conditions so conditions are not an excuse.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Perth, Australia.
India managed to score 133 runs after losing 9 wickets.
